products.title: Como Ocra Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their como range of fabrics bring a splash of colour to your home. Perfect for summer, the combination of cool grey tones with warmer yellows and oranges means this blind can be ideal for any room. Como ocra uses pale greens paired with grey tones make this blind ideal for your kitchen or bathroom. Serene colours and a free-hand pattern create a suitable blind for your own getaway. Product id: db-erbx1866 fabric colour: ocra material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes como ocra electric roller blind in grey/yellow/multicoloured.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Azure Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Add a smart, contemporary finish to your chosen room with this appealing modern pattern. Featuring eye-catching curvaceous abstract leaves with a subtle white outline on a rich azure blue background, boheme pvc blackout azure blue double-sided blind is bound to gain many compliments. Flame retardant, this electric roller blind is made out of a blackout fabric, so it wont let light escape into your room, especially on a bright morning.

products.title: Sio Marmo Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The sio marmo electric roller blind with its jewel green and gold fabric print is sure to bring an exotic touch to your decor. The design is delicate yet impactful thanks to the rich and luxurious colours. With its remote, electric control, this roller blind is a practical option for hard to reach windows and ideal for rooms that require a little luxury. products.title: Meadow Nightingale Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The meadow nightingale electric roller blind is decorated with a white floral motif on blue and creates a contrasting effect that will look so striking in situ. The fabric is pollergen treated and can be raised and lowered with ease thanks to the electric remote control, making this blind such a convenient update to any family space. products.title: Flair Aqua Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their flair range is a beautiful fabric with a fresh floral pattern to transform your home. See your room in bloom with an attractive flair aqua roller blind. The electric aspect of this blind makes it easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows. products.title: Avoca Capella Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The avoca capella electric roller blind boasts a charming print in a classic colour combination of grey and blue. This soft and cool graphic will sit easily in either a contemporary or more traditional interior. This sleek fabric blind is operated via electric control so that adjusting your window covering is even easier. products.title: Whitby Blackout Pvc Navy Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Whitby pvc blackout navy blue is a fabulous boys blind in dark navy that features a super modern cityscape of houses and trees that really lends itself well to a contemporary space. The electric operation makes opening and closing this flame retardant blind super-easy and the blackout fabric prevents unwanted light travelling into your room on a bright day. What's more, it's made of moisture resistant material so you don't have to worry if it gets splashed with water.

products.title: Quackers Pvc Blackout Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Instantly add something fun and quirky with quackers pvc blackout blue electric roller blind. It's is made of moisture resistant fabric so is ideal for a childrens room or bathroom, it features a selection of amusing rubber duckies sitting on top of blue pebbles. The flame retardant electric blind operation makes it easy to open and close and with blackout fabric, the children wont be disturbed by early morning light.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this electric roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry blossom blackout kimono blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is pollergen treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen.
